title: 服务器报错问题
author: chjiatai
txt_content:

replies.author: chjiatai
replies.txt_content:
supermiao 发表于 2020-4-11 15:53
你的ess插件和权限插件是啥发出来看下呢
基础插件是：[基础]EssentialsX。[基础]EssentialsXChat
权限组：[权限组]GroupManager。[权限组]PermissionsEx

replies.author: chjiatai
replies.txt_content:
httu 发表于 2020-4-11 15:53
试试替换EssentialsX？https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-619883-1-1.html
就是这款插件吧
